abstract: Pres Obama speaks at dedication of Edward M Kennedy Institute in Boston; praising his Senate mentor and the national example he set, Obama calls for a return to an era of compromise and collegiality in Congress.
lead_paragraph: The president spoke at the dedication the Edward M. Kennedy Institute in Boston on Monday, calling for a new era of compromise while remembering a “lion of the Senate.”

headline.main: Obama Praises Edward Kennedy, and Mourns the Loss of Collegiality
headline.print_headline: Praising a Senate Mentor, and the Example He Set

snippet: The president spoke at the dedication the Edward M. Kennedy Institute in Boston on Monday, calling for a new era of compromise while remembering a “lion of the Senate.”
